response.explain: The error occurred because the fridge object was not registered before it was used in the put_inside function. The fridge object needs to be registered first before it can be used in the function.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the lasagna
(2) Open the oven
(3) Take the lasagna out of the oven
(4) Close the oven
(5) Register the fridge
(6) Put the lasagna inside the fridge
(7) Close the fridge
(8) Wait for the lasagna to thaw
(9) Open the fridge
(10) Take the lasagna out of the fridge
(11) Close the fridge
(12) Register the oven
(13) Open the oven
(14) Put the lasagna back in the oven
(15) Close the oven
(16) Turn on the oven
